FuncDef: The display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command displays statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses. The display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command displays statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics [ interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-num> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type and number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters without spaces.
